Package net.minestom.server.tab

Class TabList

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minestom.server.tab.TabList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Viewable
    public class TabList
extends Object
implements Viewable
    The TabList class handles a single TabList that gets sent out to viewers upon any changes to its viewers, displayed players, header, footer, latency, or gamemode To have someone see this TabList use addViewer(Player) and they will get this TabList To have someone be displayed on this TabList use addDisplayedPlayer(Player) and they will appear on the TabList Players that appear on the TabList can appear on multiple TabList's however a Player can only view at a time.

      • setDisplayedGamemode

        public void setDisplayedGamemode​(@NotNull
                                 @NotNull Player player,
                                 @NotNull
                                 @NotNull GameMode gameMode)
        Sends a packet to all viewers of the TabList telling them to display the gamemode of the specified player as the specified gamemode

        This is used to communicate part of a player's actual gamemode so it's recommended you only use this method with a FakePlayer

        Parameters:
        player - The player to set the fake gamemode for
        gameMode - The gamemode to send for the specified player
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the player is not on the TabList or the TabList is set to automatically update gamemodes

      • setDisplayedPing

        public void setDisplayedPing​(@NotNull
                             @NotNull Player player,
                             int latency)
        Sends a packet to all viewers of the TabList telling them to display the latency of the specified player as the specified latency
        Parameters:
        player - The player to set the fake latency for
        latency - The latency to send for the specified player
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the player is not on the TabList or the TabList is set to automatically update latency

      • doesLatencyUpdate

        public boolean doesLatencyUpdate()
        Whether the TabList is configured to automatically send player latency updates to all its viewers
        Returns:
        boolean whether player latency will be auto-updated on TabLists

      • setLatencyUpdates

        public void setLatencyUpdates​(boolean latencyUpdates)
        Sets whether the TabList will send packets when a user's latency is updated. This would occur when a keepalive packet is received.
        Parameters:
        latencyUpdates - true/false whether or not latency updates will be sent

      • doesGamemodeUpdates

        public boolean doesGamemodeUpdates()
        Whether the TabList is configured to automatically send player gamemode updates to all its viewers
        Returns:
        boolean whether player gamemode will be auto-updated on TabLists

      • setGamemodeUpdates

        public void setGamemodeUpdates​(boolean gamemodeUpdates)
        Sets whether the TabList will send packets when a user's gamemode is updated.
        Parameters:
